author: psmith
msg: Fixed a visual bug.  When the Tutorial was started, and the main LogUI screen
resized, the status bar did not go through a layout validation, and

author: psmith
msg: Fixed a bug where a map containing package names to
tree nodes wasn't using the correct looping index.

author: psmith
msg: Still trying to track down a bug in JDK 1.4.2 (I think it's only this version).
While the logger tree panel is visible, if you hold down the
ctrl key and mouse over a one of the filterable columns the cursor
changes to the Magnify (this is good).
When the Logger tree panel is not visible, the mouse cursor
doesn't change (even though the filtering will still work).

msg: Added support for !, != and LIKE (oro regexp)

msg: Taking into account the new o.a.l.joran packages
